verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] signed legislation that would help people with deadly diseases try experimental treatments .

President Donald Trump has signed legislation that [V: would] help people with deadly diseases try experimental treatments .
President Donald Trump has signed [ARG0: legislation] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: help] [ARG1: people with deadly diseases try experimental treatments] .
